quest: Sir Ian Botham is famous for his achievements in which sport?
quest_zh: 伊恩·博塔姆爵士（Ian Botham）以他在哪種運動中取得的成就而聞名？

quest: The UK has a declining elderly population
quest_zh: 英國的老年人口下降

quest: Who can nominate life peers? (Select TWO)
quest_zh: 誰可以提名生活同齡人？ （選擇兩個）

answers.answer: Leaders of other main political parties
answers.answer_zh: 其他主要政黨的領導人

quest: The devolved administrations each have their own civil service
quest_zh: 權力下放的政府每個人都有自己的公務員

quest: The Commonwealth can suspend any of its members
quest_zh: 英聯邦可以暫停其任何成員

quest: What is the name given to rented additional land which people use to grow fruit and vegetable?
quest_zh: 人們用來種植水果和蔬菜的租金的額外土地的名字是什麼？

quest: What type of literature are 'The Canterbury Tales' written by Geoffrey Chaucer?
quest_zh: 杰弗裡·喬uc（Geoffrey Chaucer）撰寫的“坎特伯雷故事”是什麼類型的文學作品？

quest: How are members of Parliament (MPs) elected?
quest_zh: 國會議員（MPS）如何當選？

quest: What is the name of the charity that works to preserve important buildings, coastline and countryside in the UK?
quest_zh: 為保護英國重要的建築物，海岸線和鄉村的慈善機構的名字是什麼？

quest: Which TWO are associated with a Bank Holiday?
quest_zh: 哪兩個與銀行假期有關？

answers.answer: A day when most people have an official day off
answers.answer_zh: 大多數人有正式休息日的一天

answers.answer: A holiday which is always on a Monday
A day off for all the banks in the country
answers.answer_zh: 該國所有銀行的休息一天

quest: Arranged marriages are allowed in the UK
quest_zh: 英國允許安排的婚姻

quest: Eid al-Fitr and Eid ul Adha are festivals celebrated by which religion?
quest_zh: Eid al-Fitr和Eid Ul Adha是通過哪種宗教慶祝的節日？

quest: What religion were Puritans?
quest_zh: 清教徒是什麼宗教？

quest: England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland each have a national saint, called a patron saint
quest_zh: 英格蘭，蘇格蘭，威爾士和北愛爾蘭各自都有一個國家聖人，稱為守護神

quest: Eid ul Adha remembers that the prophet Ibrahim was willing to sacrifice his son when God ordered him to
quest_zh: Eid ul adha記得先知易卜拉欣願意犧牲他的兒子，而上帝命令他命令他

quest: The European Union was originally called the EEC
quest_zh: 歐盟最初被稱為EEC

quest: The Swinging Sixties was a period of new ideas about politics, philosophy and science
quest_zh: 搖擺的六十年代是關於政治，哲學和科學的新想法

quest: Which TWO are associated with rugby?
quest_zh: 哪兩個與橄欖球有關？

quest: How often is the electoral register updated?
quest_zh: 選舉登記冊多久更新一次？

quest: The name or photograph of cases heard in the Youth Court can be published in the newspapers once the young person has been found guilty
quest_zh: 一旦被判有罪，可以在報紙上發表案件的名稱或照片

quest: Which famous poet's work was inspired by Nature?
quest_zh: 哪個著名詩人的作品受自然的啟發？

quest: Catherine Howard was Anne Boleyn's cousin
quest_zh: 凱瑟琳·霍華德（Catherine Howard）是安妮·博林（Anne Boleyn）的堂兄

quest: Which TWO are major political parties in the UK?
quest_zh: 英國哪個主要政黨是哪個？

quest: The Scottish Parliament has 33 members
quest_zh: 蘇格蘭議會有33名成員
